title: Your content can be removed without advance notice

tosdr.tldr: If your content violates the terms (in You Tube's opinion) they have a right to delete it and even terminate your account, without notice. This applies to cases of copyright infringement but also content that is pornographic, obscene or excessively long.
tosdr.case: they can delete specific files without prior notice and without a reason
